title: Ping Issue After Update
body:
After the recent Oce Connections maintenance I went from having a good 41 ping too 130 ping? I reset my modem and checked my net speed and everything sweet its how it should be, did they move the server or some shit? Feels like im playing on NA.

Regards,
Z

replies.body: I wouldn't expect a reply from this company. I've been having a similar problem since patch 5.16.

What's your IP address?
Which ISP are you using?
Where are you located?
Can you do a traceroute to 103.240.227.1 ?

I'm using TPG ADSL2+ in Victoria. I've been pinging 203.174.139.185 for my ping before I start up the game. The traceroute goes through but the issue is that my connection to the servers is not always consistent. Some days will be fine and some days the ping will fluctuate seemingly at random with no correlation to weather or internet use. During this time browsing speeds or other online services/games will perform like normal except for League of Legends.

At this moment my ping is fine but I'll try the tracert again when the problem pops up again.

At the 7th hop the signal jumps from 30ms to 200+ms then times out at the 15th hop.

For 103.240.227.1 it takes 11 hops to complete and never goes above 47ms.

What's your IP address?
Which ISP are you using?
Where are you located?
Can you do a traceroute to 103.240.227.1 ?
Yea I agree, I went from 35-39ping to 80+ ping
